item.title: Feature Engineering with Stepwise Regression
item.description: Introduction When I was studying statistics, I noticed an algorithm called “stepwise regression”. Generally, this is a method that ranks features based on their importances and finds out how important each feature is to the prediction. The following coding will show the process of finding the features importances. (Assumed that this is a binary classification) Please note that this is the translated post of my original post in CSDN (Original
